mapper.insert:
insert into my_subcontract_template.log_info(module, type, message, req_param, res_param, take_up_time, user_id, user_name, method, uri, ip, version, create_time) values
(#{entity.module}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.message}, #{entity.reqParam}, #{entity.resParam}, #{entity.takeUpTime}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.uri}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.version}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into my_subcontract_template.log_info(module, type, message, req_param, res_param, take_up_time, user_id, user_name, method, uri, ip, version, create_time) values
(#{entity.module}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.message}, #{entity.reqParam}, #{entity.resParam}, #{entity.takeUpTime}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.uri}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.version}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update module = values(module) , type = values(type) , message = values(message) , req_param = values(req_param) , res_param = values(res_param) , take_up_time = values(take_up_time) , user_id = values(user_id) , user_name = values(user_name) , method = values(method) , uri = values(uri) , ip = values(ip) , version = values(version) , create_time = values(create_time)
